body.p: The Wine development release 1.5.23 is now available.

What's new in this release:
HTTPS support no longer dependent on OpenSSL.
Support for event handling in the Mac driver.
A functional Netstat built-in application.
A bunch of C++ runtime math functions.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
